argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | sbcimdv.1 | |- ( ph -> ( ps -> ch ) ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_alrimiv | |- ( ph -> A. x ( ps -> ch ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_spsbc | |- ( A e. V -> ( A. x ( ps -> ch ) -> [. A / x ]. ( ps -> ch ) ) ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_syl5 | |- ( A e. V -> ( ph -> [. A / x ]. ( ps -> ch ) ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_sbcimg | |- ( A e. V -> ( [. A / x ]. ( ps -> ch ) <-> ( [. A / x ]. ps -> [. A / x ]. ch ) ) ) |
| 6 | 4, 5 | #P_sylibd | |- ( A e. V -> ( ph -> ( [. A / x ]. ps -> [. A / x ]. ch ) ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_impcom | |- ( ( ph /\ A e. V ) -> ( [. A / x ]. ps -> [. A / x ]. ch ) ) |
\
 Substitution analog of Theorem 19.20 of [Margaris] p. 90.  (Contributed by NM, 11-Nov-2005.)
